page.title: 11Kennoway Carnival
page.content: This year, 1985, the{Kennoway Civic {Week and Carnival}was held for the first time since 1957. The main event of the Carnival was the installation of the village{Lad {and Lass}and their attendants. These children were elected from the three Primary 7 classes in the village school. The Lad(Thomas Bremner) and the Lass(Leeanne Wishart) led the carnival procession on a float decorated with paper flowers. The Carnival Committee organised a treasure hunt, a pram race, five-a-side football, a "fun run" and a disco during the civic week. In the school a Carnival Dance and the investiture of the Ladd and Lass took place. It is hoped that the Carnival will continue to be held annually.
